title: When in pain
creator_credit: Shepard Menken, Claire Menken and Jerome Karasic
brief_description: Analyses aspects of physical and emotional pain, and examines the brain’s never-ending battle with the pain of anxiety, of alleviating pain and removing the source of pain.
creator_credit_for_label: Shepard Menken, Claire Menken and Jerome Karasic
